amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 118-466 to eliminate all non-military funding related to Ukraine.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate all non-military funding related to Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cammack amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 272 (Roll no. 149).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cammack amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 272 (Roll no. 149).
